com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.environment

Class SpotLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.environment.BaseLight
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.environment.SpotLight

  • public class SpotLight
extends BaseLight
    Note that the default shader doesn't support point lights, you'll have to supply your own shader to use this class.
    Author:
    realitix
